alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:28PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL BALDWIN COUNTY THROUGH 400 PM CDT... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of McCullough, or 19 miles northwest of Atmore. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Baldwin County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
